definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: A Content Package or Package describes a folder that is used to hold multiple perspectives.
sentences.chinese: 程序包或包是指一个用于保存多个透视图的文件夹。

sentences.english: You will be able to edit and save perspectives into any unlocked content package.
sentences.chinese: 您能够编辑并将透视图保存到任何未锁定的程序包中。

sentences.english: By default, the plug-in perspective is launched.
sentences.chinese: 默认情况下，启动插件透视图。

sentences.english: The Danish practice have sent us these new renderings of the project.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦的做法已经给我们这些新的透视图的项目。

sentences.english: Select the package name where you want the perspective to be stored.
sentences.chinese: 选择您希望将透视图存储到的程序包的名称。

sentences.english: From there you can select and display the newly saved perspective.
sentences.chinese: 从这里您可以选择并显示新保存的透视图。

sentences.english: The toolbars and menu bar are configured on a per-perspective basis.
sentences.chinese: 工具栏和菜单栏都是基于透视图配置的。

sentences.english: The default test perspective comes with a preconfigured set of views.
sentences.chinese: 默认的测试透视图设定了一组预先配置好的视图。

sentences.english: With some product licenses, this perspective might not be available.
sentences.chinese: 对于某些产品许可证，此透视图可能不可用。

sentences.english: Besides, the authors make a suggestion on how the automatic plotting of terrain perspective graphy with high level of reality can ber…
sentences.chinese: 此外，还对生成高度真实感地形透视图提出了建议。

sentences.english: Isometric drawing is much simpler than perspective drawing.
sentences.chinese: 等角图较透视图简单得多。

sentences.english: To do that, switch over to the debug perspective and test your updated application from there.
sentences.chinese: 切换到纠错透视图并在此测试更新过的应用程序。

sentences.english: You can switch perspectives whenever you need to.
sentences.chinese: 在需要时，您可以切换透视图。

sentences.english: You will now be in the Server perspective.
sentences.chinese: 现在您位于服务器透视图。

sentences.english: Besides, the authors make a suggestion on how the automatic plotting of terrain perspective graphy with high level of reality can be realized.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还对生成高度真实感地形透视图提出了建议。

definition: a plan/a planar graph/a plane figure
bird's-eye view/see also 俯瞰圖|俯瞰图[fu3 kan4 tu2]
rendering (visual representation of how things will turn out)
bird's-eye view/see also 鳥瞰圖|鸟瞰图[niao3 kan4 tu2]
